summary: Performs time-series analysis of network I/O
description: Calculates time-series based latency analysis of network connections.

parameters.name: vpn
parameters.description: Filters the time-series query with VPN usage property.

parameters.name: window
parameters.description: Specifies size of the window in seconds to perform time-series analysis.

parameters.name: frames
parameters.description: Specifies number of windows to perform time-series analysis.

items.description: The array will contain sample data in pre-determined order: Index, average DNS lookup time, average TCP connection time, average TLS handshake time, average server processing time, average content transfer time and timestamp of the sample.

200.description: Response containing time-series data and statistics
